trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> remains in memory until the associated <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> rimane in memoria fino a quando l'oggetto associato <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> viene eliminato definitivamente.

trans-unit.source: The same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> is returned from subsequent calls to this method and to calls to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La stessa istanza del <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> viene restituito dalle chiamate successive a questo metodo e alle chiamate a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The type of the peer is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> virtual callback.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo del peer è determinato dal <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> callback virtuale.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> does not implement the callback, no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> is created and this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> non implementa il callback, non <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer> viene creato e questo metodo restituisce `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> per l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> has not been created by the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement(System.Windows.ContentElement)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> per il <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> specificato, oppure <see langword="null" /> se il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> non è stato creato dal metodo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement(System.Windows.ContentElement)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the element associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tasto di scelta rapida per l'elemento associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> string.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la chiave di accesso per la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associata all’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />.

trans-unit.source: The access key for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiave di accesso per l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Custom" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di enumerazione <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Custom" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la stringa che identifica in modo univoco l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId" />.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the automation identifier.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'identificatore di automazione.

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property, and if that isn't set, it's the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore dell'identificatore di automazione è il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> , proprietà e se questa non è impostata, è il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> representing the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> che rappresenta il rettangolo di delimitazione dell’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Rettangolo di delimitazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi figlio dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> string.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the clickable space that is on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> che rappresenta lo spazio selezionabile in <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The point that represents the clickable space that is on the element.
trans-unit.target: Punto che rappresenta lo spazio selezionabile dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the clickable point is any point that is within the visible client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that would result in issuing the command that the button represents, when the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> by using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'elemento è un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, il punto selezionabile è qualsiasi punto all'interno dell'area client visibile del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> che verrebbero eseguendo il comando che rappresenta il pulsante, quando l'utente fa clic il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> tramite il mouse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la stringa che descrive la funzionalità dell’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.

trans-unit.source: The string that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che descrive la funzionalità dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The string that is returned generally is the same text that is provided in the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: La stringa restituita corrisponde in genere al testo fornito nella descrizione comando per il controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that conveys the visual status of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa che fornisce lo stato visivo dell’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the status.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene lo stato.

trans-unit.source: For example, the status of a messenger contact could be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, lo stato di un contatto di messenger potrebbe essere "Occupato" o "Online".

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that contains the type of the item that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa leggibile che contiene il tipo di elemento che l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> rappresenta.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType" />.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the item type.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il tipo di elemento.

trans-unit.source: Examples are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
trans-unit.target: Esempi sono "Documento", "Email" e "Contact".

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> that is targeted to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> per l’etichetta <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> destinata all'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> per l'elemento di destinazione di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method could get the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'elemento è un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> (controllo), il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> metodo è stato possibile ottenere il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> che è associato il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the notification characteristics of the live region of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le caratteristiche di notifica dell'area dinamica di <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associata a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLiveSetting" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLiveSetting" />.

trans-unit.source: The notification characteristics of the live region.
trans-unit.target: Le caratteristiche di notifica dell'area dinamica.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'etichetta di testo dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'etichetta.

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà nome può essere considerata come stringa di testo che si utilizzerebbe per spiegare il controllo viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: È importante disporre di una rappresentazione testuale per tutti i controlli di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] in modo che è possibile fare riferimento al controllo è a livello di codice in modo localizzato.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> is laid out in a specific direction.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> è disposto in una direzione specifica.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation.None" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di enumerazione <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation.None" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider" /> interface if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider" /> se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> currently has keyboard input focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> ha correntemente uno stato attivo di input dalla tastiera.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element has keyboard input focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'elemento ha lo stato attivo di input dalla tastiera; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> is an element that contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> è un elemento che contiene dati presentati all'utente.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> is something that the end user would understand as being interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> è un elemento che l'utente finale potrebbe considerare interattivo o parte della struttura logica del controllo in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this automation peer can receive and send events to the associated element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se questo peer di automazione può ricevere e inviare eventi all'elemento associato.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the automation peer can receive and send events; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il peer di automazione può ricevere e inviare eventi; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> può accettare lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> is off of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> è fuori dallo schermo.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l’elemento non è sullo schermo; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà indica se l'elemento è visibile.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element can be on the screen but still not be visible, for example if the element is obscured by other elements.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, un elemento può essere sullo schermo ma non essere ancora visibile, ad esempio se l'elemento è nascosto da altri elementi.

trans-unit.source: In this case the method would return `false`.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso il metodo restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> contains protected content.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> contiene contenuto protetto.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> is required to be filled out on a form.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> è obbligatorio per il completamento di un modulo.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Imposta lo stato attivo di input dalla tastiera sull'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
